member.summary: A Camera module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.summary: Constructs a new instance.
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the camera module plugged into it.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Camera.TakePicture
member.summary: Takes a single picture using.

member.summary: Starts streaming pictures.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Camera.StartStreaming(Microsoft.SPOT.Bitmap)
member.summary: Starts streaming pictures into the provided bitmap.
member.param: The bitmap to stream into. Its size must patch the selected resolution.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Camera.StopStreaming
member.summary: Stops streaming the bitmaps.

member.summary: Whether or not the camera is ready to take pictures.

member.summary: The resolution of the pictures to capture.
